name: Mad Monkey Village
description:
Dive into our beautiful tropical pool area, a true oasis where you can relax, sunbathe, and cool off after a day exploring Cairns' incredible natural wonders. Our spacious common areas provide the perfect backdrop for connection; unwind in our TV room with Netflix and Xbox, challenge new friends, or simply share stories from your adventures.You'll love our clean and comfy rooms, all boasting air-conditioning to ensure a refreshing night's sleep in the tropical heat!

Welcome to Mad Monkey Village, your vibrant home in Cairns where tropical relaxation meets genuine backpacker community! As a proud part of the Mad Monkey Family, offering a chilled, laid-back atmosphere that's ideal for meeting fellow travellers and creating unforgettable memories. This isn't a crazy party hostel – it's where you find your travel family. Our fully equipped modern kitchen invites you to cook up whatever you fancy, fostering that authentic home-away-from-home feel. Plus, enjoy the convenience of BYO (Bring Your Own) drinks to share with your new mates!

We offer a variety of accommodation types, from mixed and female dorms and private double, with options for both shared or ensuite bathrooms. High-quality mattresses, comfy pillows, and fresh linen are always included. For your convenience, every bunk bed is equipped with power sockets, perfect for keeping your devices charged. Private double rooms come with personal towels, or you can easily hire one from our friendly reception team.

Here's what you'll enjoy with every stay:
- Ultrafast WiFi
- BYO booze (bring your own)
- Massive Social Spaces & Great Outdoor Pool Oasis
- Fully Equipped Kitchen
- Fully Air-Conditioned Rooms with Ensuites
- Spacious Rooms with Power Point & Bed Light at Each Bed
- Free Events & Nightly Entertainment (including pub crawls to top backpacker bars!)

Our central Cairns location puts you just a short stroll from the Esplanade, Lagoon, and all major tour departures for the Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest. You're perfectly positioned to explore Cairns' best bars, restaurants, and attractions with ease!
Stay connected with ultra-fast WiFi throughout the entire property, ensuring you're always able to share your adventures. Our dedicated "A Team" staff are known for their friendliness and are always ready to help you make the most of your Cairns experience!

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception is open 8 am - 10pm. If you plan to check in after 10pm, please inform us in advance, as our night manager will assist you.
- Check-out is before 10 am / Check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property.
- A valid physical passport is required for check-in. Photocopies will not be accepted.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

We look forward to welcoming you to the Mad Monkey Family so you can experience Cairns in style!

houseRules.notes:
We are a strictly 18+ property.
Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35. We would advise booking a private room (where available) if outside of this age range for your own comfort.

Reception open 8AM - 10PM
Check out before 10am and check in after 2pm

- Your credit card details have been collected to secure your reservation only and you will be required to pay all accommodation charges upon check-in.
- We do not accept guests under the age of 18 years old.
- Prices are quoted in AUD and are subject to change daily. 
- All guests are required to show a valid credit card in their name and a physical or digital government issued ID in order to check-in. Photocopies or photos of ID won’t be accepted.
- If you want to cancel or modify your reservation you must contact HostelWorld.
- The following payment methods are accepted; cash, credit or debit cards (Visa and MasterCard only). We do not accept American Express. All credit or debit cards incur a 1% payment fee. 
- The guest will be responsible for any loss or damage caused at the hostel by guests or visitors of guests. 
- When booking multiple beds in a shared dorm, we cannot guarantee to put people on the same booking in the same room, however we will do our best.
- Guests may not consume or store food and drinks in their rooms. Alcohol may not be consumed in any room at any time and can only be purchased from the designated bar on site. Any alcohol or food found in the rooms will be removed.
- Smoking is only permitted within the designated smoking areas. 

Property and Cancellation Policies :
- Cancellation of bookings within 24 hours of reservation will be charged 100% cancellation fee for the first nights stay for the number of beds booked.
- If customer fails to show up for the booking and has not give notice of cancellation, reservation will be marked as no show and you will be charged a 100% cancellation fee for the first nights stay for the number of beds booked.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
